List of all members.

Detailed Description

Class to interact with actual harware momentum wheels

Definition at line 565 of file PhysicalMomentumWheel.cpp.

void PhysicalMomentumWheel::StartSpeedQuery (   ) 
 

Start the speed reading routine of the motor in a separate thread Each wheel's speed query needs to be started individually. THe performance occurs when the spart calls for each wheel are spread evenly over 0.75 sec (value subject to change)

Definition at line 420 of file PhysicalMomentumWheel.cpp.

void PhysicalMomentumWheel::StopSpeedQuery (   ) 
 

Stop the speed reading routine of the motor. This function does not need to be called a t the end of the program. The thread will be closed automatically when the program ends.

Friend function split in a new thread that queries the wheel speed repeatedly. It begins running in the StartSpeedQuery function..
